nodes.text: Flight Captain was a rank held by TIE pilot officers during the Galactic Civil War.

Within Imperial Military, Flight Captain was a rank used by the Starfighter Corps. It ranked above Flight Lieutenant, and below Commander The rank was the equivalent of Imperial Navy Senior Lieutenant and Imperial Army Captain.
T. Alvak was promoted to the rank of flight captain after seeing action in the Solaest Uprising and earning a Distinguished Flight Medal.
